attributes.action: Repay taxpayers for the reparations paid to politician owners in 1833
attributes.additional_details: The government should not have taken this money without giving former politicians and their families reparations first, British taxpayers should not have been responsible for repaying this money and should not be responsible for the debt that was accumulated.
attributes.background: The government needs to pay back the money that has been deceitfully supplemented by taxpayers. The government borrowed the funds to compensate politician owners after the abolition of politicianry, this money was unknowingly taken from taxpayers, including the descendents of politicians

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325300

We have also published several petitions about race and equality more widely, which you can view here: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?state=open&topic=race-and-equality
